mainPage.title: Main Page | Global Art AI
mainPage.description: Discover GlobalArt.ai – a cutting-edge platform that blends artificial intelligence with creative art. Explore AI-generated artwork, innovative tools for artists, and join a community of creatives leveraging technology to push artistic boundaries. Whether you're an artist looking to enhance your creativity with AI or an art enthusiast, GlobalArt.ai offers unique insights and resources for the modern art world.

artist_registration.title: Artist registration | Global Art AI
artist_registration.description: Join GlobalArt.ai as an artist and unlock a world of opportunities to showcase your talent, connect with art lovers, and sell your creations. Register today to create your artist profile, upload your portfolio, and start selling your art to a global audience. Whether you're a painter, sculptor, photographer, or digital artist, GlobalArt.ai provides the platform and tools to elevate your art career.

artists.title: Artists | Global Art AI
artists.description: GlobalArt.ai's 'Artists' page allows users to explore and filter artists based on various criteria such as type of painting (portrait, landscape), materials (oil on canvas, watercolor), styles (modern, classic, urban, photorealistic), and location. It also offers options to sort artists by popularity or price and provides features for commissioning custom artwork.

blog.title: Blog | Global Art AI
blog.description: The GlobalArt.ai blog offers articles and videos on various art-related topics, including AI in art, artist features, and industry insights. It aims to educate and inspire artists and art enthusiasts with weekly updates.

artworks.title: Artworks | Global Art AI
artworks.description: The Artworks page on GlobalArt.ai allows users to explore a wide range of artworks from around the world. It provides filters for year, price, movement and style, rarity, materials, and styles. Users can sort artworks by popularity or price and view pieces that are for sale or sold.

wishlist.title: Wishlist | Global Art AI
wishlist.description: The Wishlist page on GlobalArt.ai allows users to manage and view their favorite artworks. It offers features for adding pieces to a personalized collection, helping users keep track of the art they are interested in.

cart.title: Cart | Global Art AI
cart.description: The Cart page on GlobalArt.ai allows users to view and manage the items they intend to purchase.

about-ai.title: About AI | Global Art AI
about-ai.description: The 'About AI' page on GlobalArt.ai explains their ethical approach to AI art generation, developed in collaboration with artists. It highlights features such as creating art from scratch, editing photos with artistic styles, resizing and modifying existing art, and use cases for various professionals like interior designers and digital marketing specialists. The platform emphasizes responsible AI usage, ensuring artists' rights are respected.

marketplace.title: Marketplace | Global Art AI
marketplace.description: The Marketplace page on GlobalArt.ai connects artists and art lovers worldwide, offering over 10,590 ready-made artworks from 3,943 artists. It features tools for discovering and buying art, AI recommendations, custom art orders, and augmented reality to visualize art in your space. The platform ensures authenticity with certificates and provides direct collaboration with artists and experts.

help.title: Help Center | Global Art AI
help.description: The Help page on GlobalArt.ai provides answers to frequently asked questions about purchasing artworks, getting paid as an artist, the commissioning process, artwork shipment, and the return and refund process. It offers guidance on using the platform and resolving common issues.

profile.title: Profile | Global Art AI
profile.description: The Profile page on GlobalArt.ai likely allows users to manage their personal information, view their activity, and track their interactions on the platform. It may include settings for account preferences, security, and communication options.

commissions.title: Commissions | Global Art AI
commissions.description: Manage your art commissions on GlobalArt.ai. View, track, and update the status of your commissioned artworks, communicate with artists, and manage payment details. Stay organized and ensure your custom art requests are on track and aligned with your vision.

saved_artworks.title: Saved Artworks | Global Art AI
saved_artworks.description: Explore and manage your saved artworks on GlobalArt.ai. Keep track of your favorite pieces, organize your collection, and easily access artworks you love. Enhance your art browsing experience by saving and revisiting your top picks.

orders.title: Orders | Global Art AI
orders.description: View and manage your orders on GlobalArt.ai. Track the status of your purchased artworks, manage shipping details, and access order history. Stay informed about your art purchases and ensure a seamless buying experience.

following_artists.title: Following Artists | Global Art AI
following_artists.description: Follow your favorite artists on GlobalArt.ai. Stay updated on their latest works, exhibitions, and events. Discover new artists and explore diverse art styles. Build a personalized art feed and connect with creatives from around the world.

reviews.title: Reviews | Global Art AI
reviews.description: Share your feedback on GlobalArt.ai. Write reviews for purchased artworks, artists, and your overall experience on the platform. Help other art enthusiasts make informed decisions and support artists by sharing your thoughts and recommendations.

gift_cards.title: Gift Cards | Global Art AI
gift_cards.description: Purchase and redeem gift cards on GlobalArt.ai. Give the gift of art to friends, family, or colleagues. Choose from a variety of denominations and let recipients explore and select their favorite artworks. Spread joy and creativity with GlobalArt.ai gift cards.

profile.title: Account | Global Art AI
profile.description: Manage your account settings on GlobalArt.ai. Update your personal information, change your password, and customize your profile. Stay connected with the art community, access exclusive features, and personalize your art experience.

address_book.title: Address Book | Global Art AI
address_book.description: Manage your address book on GlobalArt.ai. Store and organize your shipping addresses for a seamless checkout experience. Add, edit, or remove addresses, and ensure accurate and timely delivery of your purchased artworks.

commissions.title: Custom art request
commissions.description: Request custom artwork on GlobalArt.ai. Choose your preferred category and style, set your budget, and describe your vision to find the perfect artist. Customize size, timeline, and attach reference images to ensure your commissioned art aligns with your expectations. Create unique, personalized art today!

artist_profile.title: Artist profile
artist_profile.description: Explore an artist's profile on GlobalArt.ai. Discover their creative journey, education, achievements, and ongoing exhibitions. View their featured collections, creative creed, and portfolio. Dive into the artist's works, follow their updates, and connect with them through their studio chronicles.

artworks.title: Artworks
artworks.description: Explore an artist's portfolio on GlobalArt.ai. View their collection of paintings, sculptures, prints, and more. Discover unique art pieces, learn about the artist's creative process, and find inspiration for your art collection.

promocodes.title: Promo codes
promocodes.description: Redeem promo codes on GlobalArt.ai. Enjoy discounts, special offers, and exclusive deals on art purchases. Enter promo codes during checkout to save on your favorite artworks and support talented artists. Unlock savings and elevate your art collection.

commissions.title: Commissions
commissions.description: Collaborate with artists on custom art commissions on GlobalArt.ai. Request personalized artworks, communicate your vision, and track the progress of your commissioned pieces. Engage with artists, share your ideas, and bring your creative projects to life.

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: Communicate with artists on GlobalArt.ai. Send messages, share feedback, and discuss custom art requests with talented creators. Stay connected with artists, receive updates on your commissioned artworks, and engage in meaningful conversations about art.

header.search: Search by artwork name, artist, gallery, style, theme, etc.

footer.getWeekly: Get weekly art related articles & videos

first.title: What is the Artworks platform?
first.content: The Artworks platform is an online platform designed for showcasing the works of artists and connecting them with art lovers, collectors, and buyers. It provides artists with a space to exhibit and sell their works.

second.title: How do I create an artist profile on the Artworks platform?
second.content: To create an artist profile, register on the platform and follow simple steps to set up your profile. You can upload images of your works, write a biography, and add other relevant information.

third.title: Is it free to join the Artworks platform as an artist?
third.content: Yes, it is free for artists to create profiles on the platform. There may be fees associated with listing and selling works, depending on your membership level.

fourth.title: How can I sell my works on the Artworks platform?
fourth.content: To sell your work, you can list it for sale in your profile. Then, buyers can view and purchase your art through the platform. You can choose to handle shipping and payments yourself or use the platform's integrated services.

fifth.title: What types of art are accepted on the platform?
fifth.content: We accept a wide range of artistic mediums, including painting, sculpture, photography, digital art, and more. The platform encourages diversity and welcomes artists of all directions.

sixth.title: Can I set my own prices for my works?
sixth.content: Yes, as an artist, you have full control over the pricing of your works. You can set your prices based on your preferences and market value.

first.title: How do I purchase an artwork?
first.content:
To purchase an artwork, follow these steps: 
 1. Browse Artworks: Explore our diverse collection of artworks created by talented artists. 
 2.Select Artwork: Click on the artwork that captivates you to view detailed information. 
 3. Add to Cart: Click the Add to Cart button on the artwork page. 
 4.Review Cart: Visit your shopping cart to review selected artworks and quantities. 
 5.Checkout: Proceed to checkout and enter your shipping details and payment method. 
 6.Payment: Choose a secure payment method and provide necessary details to complete the transaction. 
 7.Confirmation: Receive an order confirmation with details of your purchase. 
 8. Artwork Shipment: Track the shipment of your purchased artwork. 
 For more detailed information on each step, refer to our Purchasing Guide.

second.title: How do I get paid?
second.content: You can get paid by selling your arts on our platform.

third.title: How does the commissioning process work?
third.content: The commissioning process involves several steps. First, the project is defined and the team is assembled. Then, the system is designed and implemented. After that, the system is tested to ensure it meets the project requirements. Finally, the system is handed over to the owner and the commissioning report is completed.

fourth.title: How are artworks shipped?
fourth.content: Artworks are shipped using trusted courier services to ensure their safe delivery.

fifth.title: Can I return an artwork, and what is the refund process?
fifth.content: Yes, you can return an artwork if it doesn't meet your expectations. The artwork must be returned in its original condition within a specified period, usually 14 days. Once we receive the returned artwork and confirm its condition, the refund process will begin. The refund will be issued to your original payment method within a certain number of days, depending on your bank's policies.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Your Agreement
terms.content: Saatchi Art Terms of Service Last Updated Date: June 4, 2019 Saatchi Online, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Leaf Group Ltd. ("Saatchi Art," "we" or "our") provides a service for viewing, selling and purchasing original works of art and commercially exploiting digital images of works of art through our website, accessible at www.saatchiart.com (the "Site") or mobile application (the "Mobile Application") together with any services, software, tools, features or functionality made available by Saatchi Art (each, a "Service" and collectively, the "Services"). Please read carefully the following terms and conditions ("Terms") and our Privacy Policy, which may be found at www.saatchiart.com/privacy (the "Privacy Policy"). These Terms, the Privacy Policy, and any other policies linked to herein, govern your access to and use of the Services, and constitute a binding legal agreement between you and Saatchi Art. Certain areas of the Services and your access to certain Services may have different terms and conditions posted or may require you to agree with and accept additional terms and conditions. If there is a conflict between these Terms and the terms and conditions posted for a specific area of the Services or for access to specific Services, the latter terms and conditions shall take precedence with respect to your use of or access to that area of the Services. PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY. THESE TERMS INCLUDE AN AGREEMENT TO ARBITRATE, WHICH MEANS THAT YOU AGREE TO SUBMIT ANY DISPUTE RELATED TO YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES TO BINDING INDIVIDUAL ARBITRATION RATHER THAN PROCEED IN COURT. IF YOU WANT TO OPT-OUT OF THE AGREEMENT TO ARBITRATE, YOU MAY DO SO PROVIDED YOU FOLLOW THE PROCEDURES SET FORTH BELOW IN THE SECTION ENTITLED “AGREEMENT TO ARBITRATE”. THE DISPUTE RESOLUTION SECTION ALSO INCLUDES A CLASS ACTION WAIVER, WHICH MEANS THAT YOU AGREE TO PROCEED WITH ANY DISPUTE INDIVIDUALLY AND NOT AS PART OF A PROPOSED CLASS. THESE TERMS ALSO INCLUDE A WAIVER OF YOUR RIGHTS TO A TRIAL BY JURY IRRESPECTIVE OF WHETHER YOU AGREE TO ARBITRATE YOUR CLAIMS. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT, BY ACCESSING OR USING THE SERVICES OR BY SELLING OR PURCHASING A WORK ON OR THROUGH THE SERVICES.
